Activity: Wake up, mentally prepare for the day's tasks.
Log in to the system, check emails, and respond to any urgent requests.
Continue researching potential data sources, focusing on options data. Evaluate different vendor offerings and data quality.

Write an email to @qres-1, @qres-2, @qres-3 to discuss the data requirements, potential arbitrage strategies, and how options data can contribute to the model. TOPIC: Data Requirements and Potential Arbitrage Strategies.
Refine the data cleaning procedures based on yesterday's testing and feedback from the email discussion. Incorporate error handling and data validation checks.
Lunch break, read news related to the financial market.
Enhance the data cleaning script to handle outliers using statistical methods (e.g., Z-score, IQR). Implement visualization techniques (e.g., box plots, histograms) to identify outliers.
Run the updated data cleaning script on a larger dataset and assess its performance. Analyze the distribution of the cleaned data and compare it to the original data.
Write an email to @sdev-1, @sdev-2 to discuss about data pipeline and infrastructure to automated data cleaning. TOPIC: Data pipeline and infrastructure.
Update documentation to reflect the changes made to the data cleaning procedures and script.
